title: Protecting children from abusive games act.
body:
https://www.gameskinny.com/0ziko/newly-proposed-federal-legislation-seeks-to-outlaw-microtransactions?utm_source=onesignal&utm_medium=Web-Push&utm_campaign=mtx-banned-us-new-law

Summary:

A senator wants a law which would forbid companies from operating games played by minors in which they can spend money on things like loot boxes by arguing it is gambling and exploitation of minors.   

I'm sure this law would never pass, but it's interesting to think about what would happen to League if it did.  

Thoughts?
